name: Elemental Circle
uniques: Can only be built to improve a resource
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+10 Gold]
Mage units are stronger on this tile
Witcher units are stronger near this tile

civilopediaText.text: A place where magic is strong, enough for people to have erected monuments. Mages can draw power from Circles of Elements, and witchers can learn new Signs, as well as getting a momentary boost for the spells they already know.
